Quick Start with sklearn-discretefirstorder¶

Installation¶

Install the package from PyPI¶

At the moment, the package is not available on PyPI.

Install from source¶

If you prefer, you can clone this project to your machine and install it from your local copy of the repo:

$ git clone https://github.com/miguelfmc/sklearn-discretefirstorder
$ cd sklearn-discretefirstorder
$ pip install .

Contribute¶

Feel free to contribute to this project by raising Pull Requests on GitHub.
